Description.Bans: You can ban and manage banned users within your experience. Read about the guidelines for banning users in {linkStart}Creator Policies{linkEnd}.
Description.UserBansEmptyState: User bans help you manage your experience more effectively. {linkStart}Learn More{linkEnd}.
Description.BanHistory: A history of all bans applied.
Description.ConfirmUnban: They will be able to access your experience unless you ban them again. Unbanned users will no longer appear in the table.
Description.AddDetails: Let your users know why they are being banned from your experience. Note that all users provided in one submission will have the same ban reasons and duration. Public ban reasons must abide by the {linkStart}Community Standards{linkEnd}.
Description.SetDuration: Set the duration of the ban. All users provided above must have the same ban reason.
Description.AddUserIds: Provide the user IDs for the user(s) you want to ban. If you are providing a list, please separate user IDs with commas.
Label.BanAltAccounts: Apply ban to all known alt accounts
Title.UnbanUsersDialogError: There was a problem unbanning users
Description.UnbanUsersDialogError: An unban was not applied to the following user IDs:
Tooltip.NoUsersFoundSearch: No banned users found for your search.
Title.BanUsersDialogError: Some user IDs were not found
Description.BanUsersDialogError: A ban was not applied to the following user IDs:
Title.BanUsersGenericDialogError: There was a problem banning users
Tooltip.ErrorLoadingTable: There was a problem loading the table
